SEE THROUGH
WHAT YOU CONSUME

Scan your way through the supermarket aisle with Xume and defeat the evils of poor choices and unhealthy products.
With Xume, you get an amalgamation of superman's x-ray vision and Ironman's AI bestfriend in one easy application.
We help you see through products and help you make informed choices for your gut & health.
